content: As an AI language model, I don't have the ability to see Broadway shows or any other live performances. However, some dance-focused productions that have recently gained significant acclaim include "Come From Away," "Dear Evan Hansen", and "Wicked." Although they're not dance-centric shows, these productions feature mesmerizing choreography that adds a unique and captivating element to the overall performance. Additionally, dance-focused productions like "Alvin Ailey American Dance Theater" and "Matthew Bourne's Swan Lake" have also received critical acclaim and are highly recommended for dance lovers.
